title: RobbieRich
author: RobbieRich
content: Does anybody have any info regarding the 31k wallet on lostbitcoins.org ?Love to know more ! Or for that matter the 26 btc wallet ... Many thanks and rewards if helpfull !

comments.author: o_e_l_e_o
comments.body: Quote from: RobbieRich on June 23, 2023, 01:17:54 PMDoes anybody have any info regarding the 31k wallet on lostbitcoins.org ?Yes. It's a scam.

comments.author: Diplester6666
comments.body: I wasn't aware of this site until now. Looks like an obvious scam.Why would they give you a 30,000 BTC wallet for just $10,000 if it was that easy to guess/crack the password? Don't you think someone who is running the site has less brute-force capability than common folks like you and me?

comments.author: Minhxx
comments.body: Seems to be a scam, no one will automatically let us inert if you transfer money to them you will lose them. The trick is too old, surely no one will be fooled
